goals__remit:
IWTO’s vision is a sustainable, profitable, international wool industry, working together for the future of our fibre. 
 
Our mission is to connect all parts of the wool supply chain in order to strengthen wool’s credentials as the world’s leading sustainable fibre and represent the wool industry at international level. 
 
We accomplish our mission through the following activities: 
 
communicating the benefits and values of wool to both internal and external stakeholders 
documenting and disseminating the science that supports wool’s unique natural properties 
linking members and international agencies and organisations 
governing the trading standards and regulations for wool across the world 
supporting a platform for information and knowledge-sharing 
 
We value global thinking, transparency at all levels, sustainability and profitability.
